entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow with periods of ice pellets early in the morning and with periods of rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 5:40 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
